Subtest.name: dash-pcont
Subtest.desc: load a video and an audio, encode in AVC and AAC, extract 2 ranges on result with period start markers assigned and create DASH session using segment timeline, 1.920 second segment and custom templates using properties set on each range - periods are continuous
Subtest.Command: gpac -i counter_30s_audio.aac:gfloc:#Delay=-1024 @ resample:osr=48k:och=1 @ enc:c=aac:FID=GENA1 -i counter_30s_I25_baseline_320x180_128kbps.264 @ enc:c=avc:fintra=1.920:FID=GENV1 reframer:#ClampDur=9.6:FID=RF1:SID=GENA1,GENV1:xs=0,9.6::props=#PStart=0:#m=m1,#PStart=19.2:#m=m3 -i counter_30s_audio.aac:gfloc:#Delay=-1024 @ resample:osr=48k:och=1 @ enc:c=aac:FID=GENA2 -i counter_30s_I25_baseline_320x180_128kbps.264 @ enc:c=avc:fintra=1.920:FID=GENV2 reframer:#ClampDur=9.6:FID=RF2:SID=GENA2,GENV2:xs=9.6:#PStart=9.6:#m=m2:#BUrl=http://ROMAIN -o out/pcont/manifest.mpd:stl:segdur=1.920:template=$m$_$Type$_$Number$:SID=RF1,RF2

Subtest.name: dash-pdisc
Subtest.desc: load a video and an audio, encode in AVC and AAC, extract 2 ranges on result with period start markers assigned and create DASH session using segment timeline, 1.920 second segment and custom templates using properties set on each range - periods are not continuous
Subtest.Command: gpac -i counter_30s_audio.aac:gfloc:#Delay=-1024 @ resample:osr=48k:och=1 @ enc:c=aac:FID=GENA1 -i counter_30s_I25_baseline_320x180_128kbps.264 @ enc:c=avc:fintra=1.920:FID=GENV1 reframer:#ClampDur=9.6:FID=RF1:SID=GENA1,GENV1:xs=0,19.2::props=#PStart=0:#m=m1,#PStart=19.2:#m=m3 -i counter_30s_audio.aac:gfloc:#Delay=-1024 @ resample:osr=48k:och=1 @ enc:c=aac:FID=GENA2 -i counter_30s_I25_baseline_320x180_128kbps.264 @ enc:c=avc:fintra=1.920:FID=GENV2 reframer:#ClampDur=9.6:FID=RF2:SID=GENA2,GENV2:xs=9.6:#PStart=9.6:#m=m2:#BUrl=http://ROMAIN -o out/pdisc/manifest.mpd:stl:segdur=1.920:template=$m$_$Type$_$Number$:SID=RF1,RF2
